name: Neuroware, Inc.
description: Developer of blockchain applications designed to properly leverage the benefits of distributed ledger technologies. The company's applications develop a range of specialized non-financial protocols for the blockchains and open-source e-wallet technology that runs entirely in the browser and can be embedded into anything that supports local storage, as well as the services, combine on-chain data storage, decentralized identity, and authentication and public key logistics, enabling clients to get training, education, and awareness for exploring blockchain technology.
one_liner: Developer of blockchain applications designed to properly leverage the benefits of distributed ledger technologies. The company's applications develop a range of specialized non-financial protocols for the blockchains and open-source e-wallet technology that runs entirely in the browser and can be embedded into anything that supports local storage, as well as the services, combine on-chain data storage, decentralized identity, and authentication and public key logistics, enabling clients to get training, education, and awareness for exploring blockchain technology.
